summary: This bill, S. 716, introduced in the Senate, is for the relief of Vichai Sae Tung (also known as Chai Chaowasaree). It grants Vichai Sae Tung permanent resident status in the United States.  The bill specifies he is considered lawfully admitted upon enactment of the bill, contingent upon payment of required visa fees. The Secretary of State is instructed to reduce the number of available immigrant visas by one in the following fiscal year from the country of the alien's birth.
